name: Down & Out In South Centauri
description:
Disaster has struck!
Your spaceship has broken down and left you stranded on this strange planet.
Gather what resources you can and repair your ship...and be careful...

...they mostly come at night...mostly

Important note unfortunately right now the spaceship lacks the capacity to withstand velocity in order to launch please be patient and thank you for your understanding (yeah we have a bug that causes the game to crash and we are currently trying to fix it we will upload the source code along with the new build)
